title: America's Prince: The John F. Kennedy Jr. Story

sources.title: John F Kennedy: The Final 24 (Full Documentary) The Story of His Final 24 Hours
sources.description:
John Kennedy Jr. was American royalty and a cultural icon.  His promise of living out his political legacy bequeathed to him on the day of his father’s assassination, was cut short over the Atlantic Ocean one July night.  Kennedy’s death and that of his wife and sister-in-law, were the result of a series of bad decisions Kennedy had made during his last day. A day plagued by stress when his life depended on his ability to think clearly.  Final 24 examines the string of errors that led to his tragic demise.

SE1 EP06

Directed by Mike Parkinson
2006
Dave McRae

metadata.Plot: It may sound like a fairy tale, being born as son of the murdered JFK, the most 'regal' US President ever, but for John 'John-John' Kennedy, it's a burden. When he becomes an Assistant D.A., the press is all over him, flunking one exam gets smeared all over the national press, wherever he goes people point at him, recognizing face and/or name, but hardly notice what he actually does. His mediatic mother Jacqueline Kennedy-Onassis pushes him, stifles him, forbids him to become an actor or won't hear of him dating an actress, then dies herself. Finally the legendary Kennedy curse, which never skipped a generation, chooses him to be the victim of an airplane accident...
metadata.Actors: Kristoffer Polaha, Portia de Rossi, Jacqueline Bisset
